member.name: D2D1_VERTEX_USAGE
member.summary: Indicates whether the vertex buffer changes infrequently or frequently.

member.name: D2D1_VERTEX_USAGE.D2D1_VERTEX_USAGE_STATIC
member.summary: The created vertex buffer is updated infrequently.

member.name: D2D1_VERTEX_USAGE.D2D1_VERTEX_USAGE_DYNAMIC
member.summary: The created vertex buffer is changed frequently.
